Survey.title: Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing: A Survey
Survey.abstract: This paper surveys recent advances in deep learning methods for natural language processing tasks. We cover neural architectures including RNNs, LSTMs, and Transformers, and their applications in translation, summarization, and question answering.

Survey.title: Reinforcement Learning in Robotics: Current Trends
Survey.abstract: We review recent developments in applying reinforcement learning to robotics applications. Topics include sim-to-real transfer, multi-agent systems, and safety-critical control.

Experimental.title: Transformer Models in Computer Vision
Experimental.abstract: We explore the application of transformer architectures, originally designed for NLP, to computer vision tasks. Our experiments show state-of-the-art results on image classification and object detection.

Experimental.title: Meta-Learning for Few-Shot Classification
Experimental.abstract: This work presents a novel meta-learning approach for few-shot classification tasks. We demonstrate that our method achieves superior performance with limited training data across multiple domains.

Experimental.title: Graph Neural Networks for Molecular Property Prediction
Experimental.abstract: This paper introduces a graph neural network architecture specifically designed for predicting molecular properties. We achieve state-of-the-art results on benchmark datasets.
